pollInterval.title: Poll Interval
pollInterval.description: Determine how often should device information be fetched (in milliseconds)

overrides.title: Overrides for default values of the console
overrides.description: Most of the information is fetched from the console itself. If you want to override some values, you can do it here; create an entry for each console you want to override by providing the device ID and the properties to override.

apps.title: List of applications you can control.
apps.description: (Doesn't work on PlayStation 5) A list of playstation games. You can find them here serialstation.com or use `playactor check` to get information about the running title.
